name: Hotel Le Cofortel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an "airport hotel" and I was not expecting much there is except a good nights sleep. I was really surprised how nice it was. The room was large, clean, and nicely appointed. The people who worked there were friendly and helpful. The free breakfast was better than most hotels.
reviews.title: Very good for the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It would have been nice if there was an airport shuttle, but from what I can tell, no hotel in Quebec offers that service. But the Le Cofortel was only a $10 taxi ride from the airport, and it avoids having to summon and wait for a shuttle.
reviews.title: Good price, terrible service, unclean room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The area around the hotel is not that nice, so I wouldn't book this hotel as a destination for a Quebec vacation. Better to pay the extra money and book a hotel in the old city for that. But this is a perfect hotel for a business trip or for people who need a room near the airport for a night.
reviews.title: Positively surprised!,

reviews.text: During my travels through Canada the weekend of October 11th with my boyfriend, we lodged for 1 night at the Cofortel. This is a newer hotel with very modern decor and amenities. The room was modernly decorated and the bedding comfortable. The room had a fridge but no microwave which was okay as the price for the king room was reasonably priced. The bathroom, however, was fairly clean with exception to hair on the floor. All other fixtures in the bathroom were clean. Come time to go to bed, we found hair on our pillows. My guess is that the linen was changed and cleaned, however, the pillows were placed on the floor while the housekeeper made the bed. This told me one, that she didn't pay attention to detail, ensuring our bed was clean, and two that the carpets probably haven't been vacuumed in quite some time. We ended up tossing the pillows with hair on the floor and resorted to sleeping on the side of the bed that was hair-free and clean. Breakfast was included, however, the front desk attended did not notify us of this during checkin. My boyfriend figured it out while retrieving something from our car the next morning around 10a. Upon checkin we didn't find the front desk assistant very helpful or pleasant. We had to ask for Wifi access which should've been included with our reservation. The internet was the slowest I've experienced at any hotel. I will definitely not stay at the Cofortel again when visiting Quebec in the future.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had exactly what I wanted and more....great LOCATION : near airport and isolated from street noises, bus stops at easy walking distance, busses to town and coach station opposite hotel, varied restaurants walking distances. MODERN: latest bathroom installations and lights,Internet in room, P.C in public area, nice room and public areas decoration. Breakfast FOOD is varied,nourishing and always available. STAFF is courteous,helpful,neatly dressed,very professional. The PRICE per night is definitely " value for money" to which must be added modest price for taxi to/from airport and public transport to downtown . We recommend and will re-book next opportunity.
reviews.title: Handy location, super clean, newly renovated-modern!

description: Hotels Quebec city near airports with business meeting facilities, conference room. When it comes to high quality, yet affordable accommodation, Cofortel redefines the norm. Whether you are planning a business or a leisure trip, you are guaranteed to find the best of both worlds.
